title: Minted Mushy Peas with Crème Fraîche

preparations.content: Place water, garlic and 1 tsp salt in mixing bowl then heat <b>6 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add peas and cook <b>7 min/98°C/speed 1<b>. Drain through simmering basket, discarding water then return peas and garlic to mixing bowl.
Add butter and chop <b>3 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add crème fraîche, mint, ½ tsp salt and pepper then mix <b>15 sec/speed 3<b>. Serve immediately while hot.
